original_title: Rating Dogs on a Scale of 1-10
overview: Truth as held to be self-evident, however inconsequential or ludicrously subjective. Truth as not a matter of opinion. A meaningless game of arbitrary pronouncements that hopes to suggest other contexts in which similar games are far more insidious, while still giving viewers a good time.  Ultimately though, a film that is probably too delightful to be anything but cute.
title: Rating Dogs on a Scale of 1-10
